snippet: Stu Loeser, the former press secretary for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, has been hired by Speaker Sheldon Silver to help navigate a sexual harassment scandal engulfing the State Assembly.
abstract: New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver hires Stu Loesner, former press secretary for Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, to help navigate the sexual harassment scandal engulfing the State Assembly.
lead_paragraph: Stu Loeser, the former press secretary for Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, has been hired by Speaker Sheldon Silver to help navigate a sexual harassment scandal engulfing the State Assembly.
